meanings.definition: A type of bread or cake made from flour and yeast, typically eaten toasted with butter.
meanings.sent1: I love to have a warm crumpet for breakfast.
meanings.sent2: She spread butter on the crumpet before taking a bite.
meanings.sent3: The crumpet was so delicious that it disappeared in seconds.
meanings.sent4: The aroma of the freshly baked crumpet filled the room.
meanings.sent5: The golden-brown crumpet was a delightful treat.

meanings.definition: A sexually attractive person, especially a woman.
meanings.sent1: He couldn't take his eyes off the stunning crumpet across the room.
meanings.sent2: She was known as the office crumpet because of her beauty.
meanings.sent3: The crumpet at the party turned heads wherever she went.
meanings.sent4: She was like a rare crumpet in a sea of plain bread.
meanings.sent5: Her confidence made her the ultimate crumpet in the room.
